briefTitle: A Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of Sitagliptin/Simvastatin Fixed-dose Combination (FDC) in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Metformin Monotherapy (MK-0431D-312)
officialTitle: An Open-label Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of MK-0431D for the Treatment of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM) With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Metformin Monotherapy
summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety and tolerability of sitagliptin 100 mg/simvastatin 40 mg FDC (MK-0431D) in Vietnamese participants with type 2 diabetes mellitus with inadequate glycemic control on metformin.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG)
